name: Priority Income Fund, Inc.
description: Priority Income Fund, Inc. is a closed-end management investment company that focuses on generating income for its investors through a diversified portfolio of secured and unsecured debt instruments. Founded in 2014, the company primarily invests in senior secured loans, subordinated debt, and other income-generating investments across various sectors. The fund seeks to provide stockholders with high current income, while also striving for capital appreciation over time. Priority Income Fund utilizes a disciplined investment strategy to manage risk and enhance returns, leveraging the expertise of its investment advisor. The company is committed to transparency and regularly communicates its investment performance and strategy to its stakeholders. As a publicly traded entity, Priority Income Fund offers investors the opportunity to participate in a diversified income-focused investment vehicle, with shares that trade on the New York Stock Exchange. The fund's goal is to deliver attractive risk-adjusted returns through a balanced approach to income generation and capital preservation, catering to both individual and institutional investors looking for consistent income streams.

seo.meta_description: Explore Priority Income Fund, Inc., a closed-end investment company specializing in income-generating debt instruments. Discover our investment strategy and portfolio.

faq.answer: Michael K. McCarthy is the CEO of Priority Income Fund, Inc.

faq.answer: Priority Income Fund is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.answer: Priority Income Fund primarily invests in senior secured loans and subordinated debt.

faq.answer: Priority Income Fund was founded in 2014.
